name: Good Harvest Mukunuwenna
description:
Our very own range of SL-GAP (SL- Good Agricultural Practices) Certified Vegetables and Fruits. Used to treat stomach disorders, diarrhoea and dysentery. Good for eye sight and skin. Facilitates bowel movement. Contains - Vitamin: A, C
Minerals: Potassium, Magnesium, Calcium, Sodium, Zinc, Iron.  Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only. Actual product may slightly defer. Our team at Cargills Online takes every step to ensure to maintain the accuracy of all information displayed. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
